mapper.select: select module_id as moduleId,module_name as moduleName,page_url as pageUrl,api_url as apiUrl,api_sign as apiSign,parent_id as parentId, (select n.module_name from sys_module n where n.module_id = sys_module.parent_id and n.del_flag = 0) as parentName,fcode,level,orders, module_type as moduleType,alias,parent_alias as parentAlias,remark,icon,create_date as createDate,creator,update_date as updateDate, updater,del_flag as delFlag from sys_module where module_id = #{_parameter} and del_flag = 0 limit 1
select module_id as moduleId,module_name as moduleName from sys_module where del_flag = 0 and module_type = 1 and module_type = 1 and module_type = 2 and page_url is not null
mapper.update: update sys_module set parent_id = null where module_id = #{moduleId};
mapper.select: SELECT module_id as moduleId,module_name as moduleName,page_url as pageUrl,api_url as apiUrl,api_sign as apiSign,parent_id as parentId, (select n.module_name from sys_module n where n.module_id = sys_module.parent_id and n.del_flag = 0) as parentName,fcode,level,orders, module_type as moduleType,alias,parent_alias as parentAlias,remark,icon,create_date as createDate,creator,update_date as updateDate, updater,del_flag as delFlag from sys_module WHERE parent_id = #{_parameter}
select orders from sys_module where parent_id = #{parentId} parent_id is null and level = ${level} and module_type = ${moduleType} order by orders desc limit 1
